data.actual_result: The SMS Backup Authentication section still shows as enabled, on account A, but clicking "Reveal" shows no number and the account has no phone verification.
data.expected_result: If, and only if, the number should really be removed from account A, the "SMS Backup Authentication" section of My Account, account A, should be updated to reflect the removal.
data.short_description: Discord UI still shows 2FA backup phone as enabled, but empty, if phone is removed due to adding it to another account
data.steps_to_repro: - Add 2FA + backup phone number to account A. - Add 2FA + same backup phone number to account B.
